Reviews.Title: “Very small, cosy hotel with a gorgeous view and friendly staff!”

Reviews.Content: stayed husband zeynep sultan hotel april 2012 understand hotel luxury wont huge interiors double bathroom simple extremely clean absolutely glad breakfast fresh bread cucumbers tomatoes eggs corn flakes cheese salami olives apples tea coffe milk natural yoghurt creamcheese jam honey butter fresh juice turkish coffe lowest price view breakfast terras photos staff friendly internet ok atleast watched movies online location couldnt direction sultanahmed 3 min eminonu 7 min divan yolu street main attraction walking distance highly recommend hotel unpretentious visitors live center istanbul likes hotels warm welcome
